# Tethered Photography

## Wireless LAN Setup

1. Follow the on-screen instructions to ready the wireless LAN router.

   !Wireless LAN Setup

   > ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**  
   > You also have the option of connecting using a PIN. Display the camera PIN by pressing the focus stick (focus lever) up and enter it on the wireless LAN router.

2. Press **MENU/OK** when setup is complete.

   !Setup Complete

## Connecting Using an IP Address

Connect to a computer for tethered photography using a manually-created network/USB setting profile giving the IP address and other network settings.

1. Select **MANUAL**.

   !Manual Selection

   > ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**  
   > Select **AUTO** to assign the camera an IP address automatically.

2. Enter an IP address.

   !IP Address Entry
